def_en: Traction is a form of medical treatment, in which weights and pulleys are used to gently pull or stretch an injured part of the body for a period of time. You say that a person who is having this treatment is in traction .
Traction is a particular form of power that makes a vehicle move.

def_cn: (尤指车轮对地面的)附着摩擦力
def_en: Traction is the grip that something has on the ground, especially the wheels of a vehicle.
